question:
What was the difference in gas consumption between CZK-paying customers and EUR-paying customers in 2012?
cast the consumption into float when perform calculation; Year 2012 can be presented as Between 201201 And 201212; The first 4 strings of the Date values in the yearmonth table can represent year; Difference in Consumption = CZK customers consumption in 2012 - EUR customers consumption in 2012
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Currency = 'CZK' THEN CAST(T2.Consumption AS float) ELSE 0 END) -SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Currency = 'EUR' THEN CAST(T2.Consumption AS float) ELSE 0 END) FROM customers AS T1 INNER JOIN yearmonth AS T2 ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID WHERE substring(T2.Date, 1, 4) = '2012'
